Title: Devil
Plot: Janet decides to meet with Tommy after not speaking with him for months since the sudden death of their son. Uncle Teddy refuses to allow anyone to help him get out prison. Tommy is shocked when he accidentally discovers just who his nephew has been sleeping with.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Mike Houston,  Paige Turco,  Olivia Crocicchia,  Terry Serpico
